word: G2001 - ἐπισχύω - epischýō - ep-is-khoo'-o - Be the more fierce

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Be the more fierce
1. to give additional strength; to make stronger
2. to receive greater strength, grow stronger
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G1909 and G2480; to avail further, that is, (figuratively) insist stoutly: - be the more fierce.
